```
intros.
apply map_app_inv in H.
destruct H as [l [r [H1 [H2 H3]]]].
apply map_cons_inv in H1.
destruct H1 as [x [l' [H4 [H5 H6]]]].
exists l, x, l', r.
split.
+ rewrite H4. reflexivity.
+ split; [rewrite H2; reflexivity | split; [rewrite H5; reflexivity | rewrite H3; reflexivity]].
```
